bach_open_taxonomy.FeatureFrame¶

class bach_open_taxonomy.FeatureFrame(engine, base_node, index, series, group_by, order_by, original_df, location_stack_column, event_column)[source]¶

Class that is based on Bach DataFrame. It shares functionality with Bach DataFrame, but it is focussed on feature creation. It allows you to create features on a small dataset and write them to the entire dataset when done.

Methods

check_supported(df, location_stack_column, ...)

copy_override([engine, base_node, index, ...])

Function that calculates the links between contexts on the stack.

write_to_full_frame()

Returns the original data frame on which this feature frame is based, but with all created features added to it.
